lines.text: Hm... well, if Slick died from... getting shot... somehow...
Well, never mind how he died- maybe he had some enchantment on him?
Yeah, like- something where if the enchanted item is broken, whatever broke it turns to stone!
That one's real popular with dragons, I hear.
You said that about the Ghostbusters!
Of course I- those ain't real either, you delusional half-pint!
Anyway- Slick wasn't a wizard, though. We're pretty sure of that.
Maybe he had a wizard friend, though! Maybe his shirt was enchanted!
...No, that wouldn't do it. That stripey getup is straight from the clink.
Nah, the coat's untouched, least by whatever made the hole. It was coverin' it up, remember?
